articles.title: Upping fruit intake may lower type 2 diabetes risk - Medical News Today
articles.description: The authors of a recent study conclude that regularly consuming whole fruits, but not fruit juice, is likely to reduce the risk of developing type 2 diabetes.
articles.content:
• Type 2 diabetes is a leading form of disability globally.
